DataElement.preferredName: Tissue Donor KIR Ligand Evaluation Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no response to a question that asks if a favorable killer-cell immunoglobulin-like receptors evaluated by the receptor-ligand model.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person._The major histocompatibility proteins that are ligands for the killer-cell immunoglobulin-like receptors found on natural killer cells. Binding of these ligands to their cognate receptors plays a role in the activation of natural killer cells._Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.
